body_html:
I have the similar issue when building the python package.

root@ubuntu:~/code/tensorflow# bazel build --spawn_strategy=standalone --verbose_failures --local_resources 2048,0.5,1.0 -c dbg //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
INFO: Found 1 target...
ERROR: /root/code/tensorflow/tensorflow/python/BUILD:1903:1: Linking of rule '//tensorflow/python:_pywrap_tensorflow.so' failed: link_dynamic_library.sh failed: error executing command
  (cd /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/f8df5427e6b4d68e166f1da6eecaa8fb/execroot/tensorflow && \
  exec env - \
  external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/link_dynamic_library.sh no ignored ignored ignored /usr/bin/gcc -shared -o bazel-out/local-dbg/bin/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so -Wl,--version-script tensorflow/tf_version_script.lds -pthread -Wl,-no-as-needed -B/usr/bin -B/usr/bin -pass-exit-codes '-Wl,--build-id=md5' '-Wl,--hash-style=gnu' -Wl,@bazel-out/local-dbg/bin/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so-2.params): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
collect2: error: ld terminated with signal 9 [Killed]
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 47.299s, Critical Path: 45.82s

It builds on the 4G memory virtual machine.

body:
I have the similar issue when building the python package.

```
root@ubuntu:~/code/tensorflow# bazel build --spawn_strategy=standalone --verbose_failures --local_resources 2048,0.5,1.0 -c dbg //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
INFO: Found 1 target...
ERROR: /root/code/tensorflow/tensorflow/python/BUILD:1903:1: Linking of rule '//tensorflow/python:_pywrap_tensorflow.so' failed: link_dynamic_library.sh failed: error executing command
  (cd /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/f8df5427e6b4d68e166f1da6eecaa8fb/execroot/tensorflow && \
  exec env - \
  external/bazel_tools/tools/cpp/link_dynamic_library.sh no ignored ignored ignored /usr/bin/gcc -shared -o bazel-out/local-dbg/bin/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so -Wl,--version-script tensorflow/tf_version_script.lds -pthread -Wl,-no-as-needed -B/usr/bin -B/usr/bin -pass-exit-codes '-Wl,--build-id=md5' '-Wl,--hash-style=gnu' -Wl,@bazel-out/local-dbg/bin/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so-2.params): com.google.devtools.build.lib.shell.BadExitStatusException: Process exited with status 1.
collect2: error: ld terminated with signal 9 [Killed]
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
INFO: Elapsed time: 47.299s, Critical Path: 45.82s
```

It builds on the 4G memory virtual machine.
